item.description:
Join the DCR Park Interpreter on a hike through Myles Standish State Forest.  This hike travels along different trails each week and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  We’ll meet at the Charge Pond Parking Lot #5, which is on the right less than 1/4 mile after the turn onto Charge Pond Road. (Follow signs to the Charge Pond campground.)
All programs are free and open to the public. Rain cancels. An adult must accompany children.  Reasonable accommodations available upon request.  For more information, call the Park Interpreters at (508) 866-2580 or visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm.
The DCR map of the Myles Standish State Forest clearly shows parking lot #5 at http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/trails/mssf1.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot #5 is off Charge Pond Road. Follow the signs from park headquarters towards the Charge Pond campground. (The #5 is shown on the park map.)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off the Beaten Path- Charge Pond
